fhh_index.usage: Using My Family Health Portrait you can:
fhh_index.li2: Print your family health history to share with family or your health care worker.
fhh_index.li3: Save your family health history so you can update it over time.
fhh_index.talking: Talking with your health care worker about your family health history can help you stay healthy!
fhh_index.learn_more: Learn more about My Family Health Portrait

fhh_js.confirm_delete: This will delete all data and restart,  Are you sure you want to do this?
fhh_js.add_relative_title: Who would you like to add to your history?
fhh_js.add_relative_para: Relatives in your immediate family who aren't listed here are probably on the previous page and can be reached by closing this window and selecting the plus sign image ('Add History') next to the relative's name. Spouses and second cousins are not listed because they don't impact your family health history.
fhh_js.aunt_relationship_q: Who is the aunt related to:
fhh_js.uncle_relationship_q: Who is the uncle related to:
fhh_js.cousin_parent_q: Who is the parent of your first cousin:
fhh_js.niece_parent_q: Who is the parent of your niece:
fhh_js.nephew_parent_q: Who is the parent of your nephew:
fhh_js.granddaughter_parent_q: Who is the parent of your granddaughter:
fhh_js.grandson_parent_q: Who is the parent of your grandson:
fhh_js.halfbrother_parent_q: Who is the parent of your half brother:
fhh_js.halfsister_parent_q: Who is the parent of your half sister:
fhh_js.invalid_data_alert: Some of the data your entered was invalid, please fix your errors and try again.
fhh_js.halfway_through_adding_disease: You have not saved the new disease information, please click 'Add' to add the disease first.
fhh_js.fathers_side: My Father's Side of the Family
fhh_js.mothers_side: My Mother's Side of the Family
fhh_js.name: Name
fhh_js.remove_q: Do you really want to remove
fhh_js.remove_q2: This will also delete all their children
fhh_js.add_disease_instructions: In the list below, select a Disease or Condition (if any) from the dropdown box. Then select the Age at Diagnosis and press the Add button. You may repeat this process as necessary.
fhh_js.race_south_pacific: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
fhh_js.consanguinity: Check here if your parents are related to each other in any way other than marriage.
fhh_js.multiple_races_selectable: Multiple races and ethnicities may be selected.
fhh_js.ashkezani_q: Why are we asking about Ashkenazi Jewish heritage?
fhh_js.export_instructions: This will output the information from the point of view of one of your relatives.
fhh_js.export_instructions2: You can export for your immedaite family members: Brothers, Sisters, Mother, Father, Sons, and Daughters
fhh_js.leave_page_warning: If you leave before saving your changes will be lost.

fhh_fhh.p_create_my_history: Select 'Create My History' to create your personal profile, enter your health information, and tell us how many people are in your immediate family. You can add other family members and enter their health histories later.
fhh_fhh.quick_guide_li1: Change your Family Health History by adding, removing or changing your relatives
fhh_fhh.quick_guide_li2: Use the tools to view your family tree diagram, find out your risks for certain diseases, or export your tree to help your close family member get started.
fhh_fhh.update_more_help: To find out more about what you can do, click on the 'Get Help' link on the menu bar above.
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history_b1_before: Add information for a family member by pressing Add History
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history_b1_after: next to the name in the list.
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history_b2_before: Change your information or a family member's information by pressing Update History
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history_b2_after: next to the name in the list.
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history_b3_before: Remove a family member from your history by pressing Remove
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history_b3_after: next to the name in the list. (You cannot remove yourself, your parents, or grandparents.)
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b1: Restart your family history by clicking on the 'Restart My History' Button
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b2: Save you history to a file on your computer or into the cloud by clicking on 'Save My History' button
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b3: Add another family member to your family history by clicking 'Add Another Family Member' button
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b4: View a diagram and table of your family tree by clicking on 'View Diagram and Table' button or menu item
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b5: Export your family infomation to give a close relative a headstart on his/her family tree by clicking on the 'Copy for Family Member' menu item
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b6: Use one of the Disease Risk Calculators to determine if you are at increased risk of a disease based on your family history by clicking on the 'Disease Risk Calculator' menu item
fhh_fhh.p_update_my_history2_b7: Get additional Help by clicking on the 'Get Help' menu item
fhh_fhh.p_help_main_page: After adding immediate family information, you can:
fhh_fhh.li1_help_main_page: Check over the relatives in the family member table by doing the following:
fhh_fhh.li1_1_help_main_page: add health history for each family member by pressing on the symbol in the Add History column
fhh_fhh.li1_2_help_main_page: update health information for you or anyone by pressing on the symbol in the update history column
fhh_fhh.li1_3_help_main_page: remove a family member by pressing on the symbol in the remove relative column
fhh_fhh.li1_4_help_main_page: Add additional relatives by pressing the 'Add Another Family Member' button
fhh_fhh.li1_5_help_main_page: Save your family health history to your computer by clicking on 'Save Family History'
fhh_fhh.li2_help_main_page: On all pages including this page, you can also:
fhh_fhh.li2_1_help_main_page: Start a new history by pressing on 'Home.'
fhh_fhh.li2_2_help_main_page: Return to the screen showing a table of your family by pressing 'My Family.'
fhh_fhh.li2_3_help_main_page: Make a copy of your family health history for a family member by pressing 'Copy for Family Member.'
fhh_fhh.li2_4_help_main_page: View a diagram of your family tree and a table of your family health history by pressing 'View Diagram & Table.'
fhh_fhh.li2_5_help_main_page: Get extra help by pressing 'Get Help.'

info_dialog.instructions: We start the family health history with you. Enter the required personal information and your health history information. At the bottom of the page (you may need to scroll), press the 'Next' button. You will then be asked to tell the system which family members you would like to add to the health history.
info_dialog.health_vault: If you have a Microsoft HealthVault account, you can choose to copy your HealthVault family history information into this website. Information that you add or modify here can then be copied back to HealthVault. Press 'Copy from HealthVault' to get started.
info_dialog.family_instructions: Enter required personal information and health history information for this family member. Background information may also be entered. At the bottom of the page (you may need to scroll), press the 'Save' button to save this person's information.
info_dialog.name: Name:
info_dialog.family_twin_status: Was this person born a twin?

fhh_add_family.instructions: Now we will build your family. Tell us about your immediate family, including your brothers, sisters, children, aunts, and uncles. You can add more family members like cousins, nieces, nephews, half siblings, and grandchildren later. We automatically add your parents and grandparents for you. (We collect information only for blood relatives, not household members, step-relatives, or spouses not related by blood.)
fhh_add_family.brothers: How many brothers do you have?
fhh_add_family.sisters: How many sisters do you have?
fhh_add_family.sons: How many sons do you have?
fhh_add_family.daughters: How many daughters do you have?
fhh_add_family.muncles: How many brothers does your mother have? (your uncles)
fhh_add_family.maunts: How many sisters does your mother have? (your aunts)
fhh_add_family.puncles: How many brothers does your father have? (your uncles)
fhh_add_family.paunts: How many sisters does your father have? (your aunts)

fhh_load_save.choose_a_file: Please choose a file to upload
fhh_load_save.load_from_file: Load Your Personal Information from a File
fhh_load_save.load_file_instructions1: In this step, you can open your family health history from a previously-saved XML data file on your computer or portable storage device.
fhh_load_save.load_file_instructions2: Press 'Browse...' to select a file on your computer, then press 'Open from Computer' to open it
fhh_load_save.load_health_vault: Load Your Personal Information from Microsoft's Health Vault
fhh_load_save.load_health_vault_instructions: Microsoft HealthVault lets you gather, store, and share health information online. If you choose to copy your family history information from your HealthVault account, this website will copy data from your HealthVault account and will need you to sign in.
fhh_load_save.load_google_drive: Load Your Personal Information from Google Drive
fhh_load_save.load_google_drive_instructions: You can load a pre-saved file from Google Drive, by signing into your google drive account.
fhh_load_save.load_dropbox: Load Your Personal Information from Dropbox
fhh_load_save.load_dropbox_instructions: You can load a pre-saved file from Dropbox, by signing into your dropbox account and picking a file to load.
fhh_load_save.save_instructions_title: Why save your family health history file?
fhh_load_save.save_instructions: To respect individual privacy concerns, this website does not save your family health history information. However, you can save your family health history to your own local storage area (such as your computer's hard drive, a CD-ROM, or USB thumb drive). In addition, you can save to a third-party system such as Microsoft® HealthVault, Google Drive, and Dropbox (other third party systems will be added in the future). Some hospitals and doctors' offices will be able to obtain this family health history information stored with a third party system, if you grant them permission, and directly incorporate your family health history into an electronic medical record.
fhh_load_save.save_to_file: Save Your Personal Information to a File
fhh_load_save.save_file_instructions1: In this step, you can save your family health history to your computer or portable storage device as an XML data file. This data file can be uploaded to this website later to update your family health history.
fhh_load_save.save_file_instructions2: Press 'Save to Computer' and your browser will put the file in your preferred download location
fhh_load_save.save_health_vault: Save Your Personal Information to Microsoft's Health Vault
fhh_load_save.save_health_vault_instructions: Microsoft HealthVault lets you gather, store, and share health information online. If you choose to copy your family health history information to HealthVault, this website will copy data to your HealthVault account and need you to sign in.
fhh_load_save.save_google_drive: Save Your Personal Information to Google Drive
fhh_load_save.save_google_drive_instructions: You can save a single file to Google Drive by signing into your google drive account.
fhh_load_save.save_dropbox: Save Your Personal Information to Dropbox
fhh_load_save.save_dropbox_instructions: You can save a file from Dropbox by signing into your dropbox account and picking a location to save and naming the file.
fhh_load_save.disclaimer: When you choose to copy your family health history information to any third party system, please note that your information will be retained in that system, and will be subject to the terms of use and privacy policy of that system.

fhh_why_ask_ashkenazi.help_para: For certain conditions, such as ovarian and breast cancer, it is important to know if a person has Ashkenazi Jewish heritage for risk assessment purposes.
